entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Berens River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:51 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berens River Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -35.1°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
